Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Martinjm
Reviews.Content: Initial indications after taking just a few photos at different settings left me very impressed with the SX260.  Picture quality and zoom are fabulous.  Startup is quick as well as the speed at which it focuses and ultimately takes the photo.  Finger grip on the front is a nice touch for a camera of this size and weight.  It can easily slip out of your hands and this certainly helps (I always struggled with this on my smaller, lighter Canons).Some annoyances are the flash on the top where you tend to place your finger.  Not sure about the "easy setting" on the dial for taking pictures.  I understand the overall point, I just don't know how it makes things any simpler than the full auto function.  I would have liked to see them take this off the dial and replace it with a pre-programmed scene setting or the capability to have a fully programmable setting.  Along those same lines, there appears to be a couple "empty" spots on the dial that I think could have been reserved for the ability to pre-program some settings.I would probably give the camera a 4.5 rating given the flash location, but the picture quality and zoom for the price make this an awesome point and shoot.I have not yet used the GPS, but will try this weekend to see how it affects the battery.UPDATE April 27, 2012:Went on a 7 hour hike with the GPS on, took 80 photos and a couple videos and battery is still at full strength.  Very happy with the photo quality.  Still highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL!!!
Reviews.Author: Baby Dee "Baby Dee"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Canon PowerShot SX260HS Camera Bundle for our family trip to Disneyland.  I LOVE IT!!!The bundle included the camera, a case, a memory card (16GB), a memory card reader, an extra battery, a mini tripod, a cleaning kit, cleaning cloth and some screen protectors.The camera works wonderfully.  I haven't had any problems with it.  It is small and compact, which is exactly what I wanted.  You can take pictures almost instantly.  It takes beautiful, crisp and vibrant pictures even on the "auto" setting (meaning, even if you do not know what aperture or f-stop to use and/or are not necessarily photography savvy...  I mean, it is a point and shoot camera).  The zoom on the camera is INCREDIBLE!  I feel like paparazzi...  You can really get up close without being THAT close!  I noticed a small lag time when trying to take pictures one after the other but that may be something I can adjust with my settings.I chose this bundle because the camera and extras were worth it to me because it came with the memory card, extra battery and case.  The cleaning kit, cleaning cloth and tripod will come in handy eventually.  The memory card reader is a nice extra.  I tried putting one of the screen protectors on but you have to cut it to the size you need, which was not necessarily the problem.  It was more the application...  It's like contact paper (adhesive sticks to the actual screen) so you can see EVERYTHING that gets in between the adhesive and the camera screen.  I think the only way to have a successful application would be by being in a sterile, lint-free environment...  And have no fingerprints, because those showed up too!  I just left the screen protectors off since it was too much trouble.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara S
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my camera. It is perfect for everyday use or travel, being small and light and fits easily in my handbag.  I am still learning about all the things it can do and  so far have just being doing point and shoot but I know it can do so much more.  It feels solid, works beautifully and the quality of the photos are amazing for a camera as small as this.  It is worth paying the little bit extra to get the features that this camera has.  I am looking forward to have more time to be able to explore my new camera.Most of the extras that come with the package are necessary, and come at a good price, and getting the high quality memory card for better quality photos is worth it as the camera does not come with one.

Reviews.Title: Canon SX280
Reviews.Author: Barbara L. Irvin
Reviews.Content: My husband is an avid canon fan. This was bought as our Christmas gift to each other. The stabilizer if great. However, within three months the lens cover ceased opening all the way or closing all the way - so i have to manually make sure it opens when i want to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera; crummy case provided
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: Camera and accessories as promised except the case which was a substandard, unpadded Vivatar. Not the one in photo and is terrible for protection of camera. Not worth shipping back. Had to buy a better case at Best Buy.Kissed and made up. Got the correct case. Excellent customer service in response to complaint. Deserves a 5th star.

Reviews.Title: fun
Reviews.Author: juliep
Reviews.Content: i really like the camera, the flash pops up in a bad spot tho, its right where you hold onto camera with a finger. i stilll am learning it but vey happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: T. L. Cox
Reviews.Content: The camera has great features, and takes excellent, clear pictures.  The package deal is amazing!  Everything you could possibly want or need!

Reviews.Title: New Canon camera
Reviews.Author: John J. MATTINSON
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera and very easy to use. Takes good clear pictures and has many setting adjustments. If you read the book and play around with it a little you will find the settings very user friendly. Great camera and service from Amazon  [ASIN:B0075SUK14 Canon PowerShot SX260 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full-HD Video (Black)]

Reviews.Title: pop up flash normally hits my finger and cannot be pushed  back down.
Reviews.Author: Barry Smith
Reviews.Content: The camera worked fine but the pop up flash is a nuisance.  it is located where a person normally places their finger when holding a  small camera.  The manual says you should not push it back down so there it is, in the way, until you turn the camera off.

Reviews.Title: Good product and good price
Reviews.Author: Peng Li
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera four weeks ago and do like this product. It delivers very good picture quality overall and especially in low night. But there are two small drawbacks in design compared with my old Canon SD550: a) power button should not locate at the most right side. It is a bit too big and easily pressed unintentionally. b)  your left hand fingers will prevent the flash from pop-up if you hold the camera with both hands. This is sometime annoy when you use Auto mode.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful digital camera
Reviews.Author: BT "BT"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just before a long cruise visiting many countries.  It was compact and worked well in a belt holster.  The pictures are hi def and clear and the telescopic lens is a marvel.  I can't say enough about how great this product is and how easy it is to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: mitzi926
Reviews.Content: This camera was easy to use and my pictures look great. I am a terrible photo taker but I have been happy with the pictures taken from trips, events, and special occasions.

Reviews.Title: Came highly recommended and  Ialso highly recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Andi67
Reviews.Content: This is a small camera with a really reasonable price tag that performs amazingly.  Love it.  It will work well for many things but personally I am happy with the sharp images it takes for my real estate listings as well as the amazing zoom for taking nature shots.

Reviews.Title: Grat buy. Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Mariano Astobiza
Reviews.Content: The price is according to the quality of the product. The quality of pictures is great. The software to transfer pictures is friendly.I reccomend this product to my friends and my partners.

Reviews.Title: Thanks friends Canon
Reviews.Author: alejandro martinez
Reviews.Content: Dear Friends of Canon.My expectations about the operation of this camera were covered, I'm really happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image...
Reviews.Author: priscilla
Reviews.Content: I looked long and hard on a camera and I defiantly found it with this one. I absolutely love it and it takes awesome still and moving shots. Has great play back very clear. The stand is cheesy but I didn't buy it for that everything else is A+

Reviews.Title: Love the camera - very easy to use and takes grear pictures.
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Mayo
Reviews.Content: Love the camera - very easy to use and takes great pictures.We are only occasionally users and this fits our needs

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carmine V Granata
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife as a Christmas gift, and I think it was more for me lol nice clear screen pictures come out really good, it's also easy to use and all the extra stuff that came with it for the price! You just can't beat it....

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!
Reviews.Author: azpisces
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome. Im so pleased with it. It takes beautiful pics and like always you can never go wrong with a Canon. The case is perfect too.

Reviews.Title: out of the box awsome!
Reviews.Author: rusty21
Reviews.Content: Camera is well built, easy to use, and take great pics out of the box, great starter camera, the zoom is good for this type of camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty sweet camera
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: This camera is not bad for a guy who takes pictures of football games and autograph signings. very clear pics, the zoom works pretty darn good. the one thing i dont really like is the camera is a bit heavy but hey its worth buying.

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kim Waller
Reviews.Content: I personally chose this camera because a friend had one and i had used it and loved it!!  HIGHLY RECOMEND!! Great photo quality and love the big display screen and the easy use guide

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera.
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: Love it. I went to a concert and took incredible photos. From very far, the pics came out so clear. I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: what are you waiting for?Buy this camera.
Reviews.Author: Aimee
Reviews.Content: Great night and low light shots.... Awesome.  Great video. The sd card is fast. The extra battery is a must. I can't say enough of the picture quality. We looked at this because Consumer Reports rated it so well.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA, small enough to fit in your pocket or purse. . . .
Reviews.Author: Kay Baumgartner
Reviews.Content: Has met my expectations, as I only use as a point and shoot, so far, and not sure if I'll ever use it for anything else (my daughter will when she comes), but I like the camera, it fits in my purse and yet I have the 20X zoom that I want, and have been taking a lot of practice pictures, the bundle was the best deal and I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Okay, but has many design flaws
Reviews.Author: Thomas Roy
Reviews.Content: I've been a Canon shooter for many years now from SLR to video and DSLR, so I went right to Canon for a small, easy to carry camera for some recent travels. Mine came with the firmware update in place, but the battery life is so poor, it's really unacceptable. I called Canon and they had me send it in for repair, but the bottom line is that it's not broken, just poorly designed. The flash location is also obtrusive and inconvenient. As with any camera of this size, the zoom can be heard in the audio. Too bad as the body and overall build quality are nice. I just can't recommend this camera. A guy I traveled with had a comparable Sony that was a better overall package hands down. Don't buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Kaiser
Reviews.Content: This camera replaces an older Powershot that I really liked. It has more features than it even realized. Love the zoom quality. Amazing for such a small package.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Camera
Reviews.Author: Meg Patterson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera on the recommendation of a relative who has one and enjoys using it.  The pictures that we've taken so far have been wonderful.  The zoom is terrific, we can take great pictures from several hundred feet with out the birds flying away.

Reviews.Title: This camera exceeds my expections
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Semega
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera indoors, outdoors, daytime and nighttime and I'm impressed with the quality of photos taken. Outdoor photos have really good color and sharpness. Indoor photos are good, however some needed to be touched up because of limiting light conditions. The camera menu has almost every thing I need. The only thing I didn't like was the pop up flash. It's position was where I held my old camera's. I have since learned a different grip.

Reviews.Title: Powerful Camera!
Reviews.Author: Lisa S
Reviews.Content: I got my Canon about 3 months ago and love it.  I know most of us use our phone cameras nowadays, but there are situations where I really want to get a "GOOD" picture.  Especially when I'm going to add something to my blog or Pinterest.  You want the quality to be better than phone quality.  This camera does a lot of really cool things.  You can take self picture with a wink of your eye or a smile.  It works too!  Perfect camera for every day use.  Small enough to carry around and it isn't too expensive.  Love it and highly recommend!  There really are no negatives that I can thing of.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis Weber
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera partly because Canons are wonderful.  I have several of them dating back decades and have never been disappointed.  In particular, I wanted a camera with a powerful zoom, which this one has.  I took it to Peru recently and took hundreds of photos and didn't get a poor one that could be attributed to the camera's fault.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Present!
Reviews.Author: Dmorris
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a camera for my wife that would be easy to transport (she is from England) but also take quality pictures quickly. We have a 2yr old and you have to be fast on the draw if you want that perfect shot. The SX280 powers up and can take the first picture in seconds! We did not miss a shot Christmas morning! The outside shots are superb and the quality of the zoom pictures are great for a camera this size.My fingers sometimes get in the way of the flash popping up, but my wife doesn't have an issue, so that's all that matters. She is happy, so that's all that matters to me!

Reviews.Title: It is too soon to review performance
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Got the camera as a Christmas present. The GPS feature was what I was most interested in, and while I haven't traveled with the phone yet, I took a few photos locally and everything works well and it takes very nice pictures so far. I will leave the technical jargon to others. The accessory kit was as advertised although I was a little surprised at how small the tripod is. At first I thought it was missing from the package but then noticed the tiny box with the tripod. It does work but not sure how useful it will be.  One time when turning on the camera the flash tried to pop up and my finger was in the way. A warning appeared on the screen and told me to re-start the camera which I did and all was well. When shooting with the flash there is room to tuck you finger behind the flash so steadying the camera is no problem and it doesn't feel awkward at all. I think this may become my favorite camera.. .  It fits in my shirt pocket and still has all the power and features I like.

Reviews.Title: amazing result!
Reviews.Author: JIAHONG SHU
Reviews.Content: buy it for travel. the picture is very good, after zooming for the picture is still very clear without noise.just nice for handling,has the stable feeling but not heavy. Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Great zoom easy to use
Reviews.Author: theresa g
Reviews.Content: My daughters friend had this camera and used it at concerts to get an "up close" picture and it worked beautifully. The zoom is great and the picture isn't distorted/grainy. Used it just now for Christmas pictures....great shots all the time. Easy to use and handle, even for someone like me who isn't a pro. Glad I purchased it! So far so good, hope it will be that way.

Reviews.Title: A great point-and-shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: Otto from CT
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a replacement camera before our son's graduation this December.  Our current camera had a long "cycle time" between pictures and we were not getting the shots we wanted.  We looked at the SX280 right before Thanksgiving in a retail store and found that it was able to meet our needs.  The 20X zoom is very useful and the resolution of the pictures at 12 MP is awesome.  We were able to use the built-in WIFI feature to view the pictures on my tablet using the Cannon CW app that is free to download.  The printed guide walks you through the setup process and it is pretty straight forward.The camera does take some getting used to, especially with the pop-up flash located right where we are used to holding a camera.  The printed start-up guide is helpful, but the full PDF guide is where the real information is located and requires you to install the supplied software on a PC.  Consider getting an additional battery, especially if you are going to be using the WIFI feature or reviewing pictures on the LCD viewfinder.  We found that the battery would last about a day between taking about pictures (some with flash), reviewing them and then transferring them to another device (tablet or PC).I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants great pictures but doesn't want to spend $400+ on an entry level DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: Celso Zilbovicius
Reviews.Content: I boughtthe camera to use as a second camera but it has so many features and such a good image quality that I ajust thinking of using only this. The bundle is very useful!I wished it had another charger.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to have something I could carry with me all the time in my purse.  I find this camera easy to use and the prints to be very clear in all light settings.  I am a scrapbooker and enjoy this camera as part of my hobby.

Reviews.Title: Canon still the best
Reviews.Author: John Taylor
Reviews.Content: Canon has consistently rated top dog in consumer reports. this camera is one of a group called "megazooms". totally awesome.

Reviews.Title: great lens for a small camera
Reviews.Author: Robert M. LeBlanc
Reviews.Content: had tried the lytro and the canon is much more user friendly. like most digital cameras simply place sd card in computer and view your photos.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: MarketingMom
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an older model and I love it. The pictures are terrific and I love the 20x zoom. Easy to operate too. You won't be disappointed if you are looking for a good quality easy to use camera that produces terrific photos.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Sarah E. Ham
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good camera for my daughter and had decided on the SX260. Then when I had decided on the camera I started looking for the best deal with the camera and definitely feel I got it with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Came on time and and product was as stated!
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: Actually the product arrived early.  It had an extra battery that I was not expecting.  The camera itself is almost idiot proof.Where I bought this product I would buy again from them.  Very Reasonable price!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Frey
Reviews.Content: love this camera.  Takes great pictures.the bundle has everything I needed.....I took pictures of christmas lights, landscapes, portraits. ... all look great.... easy to use.  The flash does come up right where you want to put your finger, but I knew that ahead of time and I have gotten used to it..just put your finger on the back side not over the whole top of the camera.

Reviews.Title: IF you are looking for a deal, This is it!
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: Everyone has their own priorities about a camera. I shoot with 5D Mark ii, this is just a point and shoot for me to take to the park.  I found this one to fit what I want it for. The build and the quality is amazing. I believe this is the second  generation camera, therefore you will see a lot of improvements from its predecessor. Do not rely on the LCD for your picture quality. If you are looking for a nice inexpensive point and shoot, YOU WILL NOT BE DISSAPOINTED.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Good Dealer
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: I purchased this package from Beach Camera, very nice to deal with . Camera came on time, nice accessories , the camera it self is fantastic and easy to use. The 16 GB class 10 card is awesome. Go for it, oh and the little tripod works great. Wonderful for taking on a trip some where and you can put it in the camera pouch and take a quick picture of you and your travel companion, wife, girlfriend  etc. which is really convieniet. The wide angle lens is also awesome. Easy to take a quick picture with the tripod and then trim it down because of the wide angle you don't have to be perfect with balance. Just do it later when you print it. Great Camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara A Lavaty
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my husband's birthday to be used with Ikelite waterproof housing.  Great camera, especially with 20X zoom.  Going to purchase one for my small camera along with my Big DSR camera.

Reviews.Title: One of the best on the market
Reviews.Author: James C. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: With all of the added features, this camera gives you everything you could possibly want in a camera, It's a gift for my son, I want it!..:)

Reviews.Title: Great Package!
Reviews.Author: Kristine S.
Reviews.Content: Great camera,and package! Would definitely recommend. It's a great price considering it's $260 just for the camera at Walmart,and Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Great buy, the items the features.
Reviews.Author: Sonia Colon
Reviews.Content: I recieved it on time. Im very satisfied. Takes  beautiful pictures and has very nice features. Price unbeatable. I do recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but don't expect the camera case in the photo
Reviews.Author: Nepenthe "Mother of two daughters and three dogs"
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as expected except the camera case. I opened up the box and was VERY disappointed to find a cheap-o Vivitar case with no padding and a flimsy single strap. Got on the horn with Beach Camera (vendor that supplied the merchandise) and spoke with Joanne, who promised that the case pictured in the photo would be sent out asap. It's been almost a month since our conversation, and the case still isn't here.I won't repeat what other reviewers have written--the camera works as advertised. I'm a housewife who takes mediocre photos of her kids and dogs, and this camera performs excellently in that capacity.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, not so sure about all the accessories.
Reviews.Author: Don Ussery
Reviews.Content: Included in this package is:CNPSSX260HSK  PowerShot SX260 HS Black Digital Camera 20x Optical Zoom 1080p VideoICOL3ICM111BLK  Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case - L3ICM111-blacksnsd16gc10k  16 GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card - Class 10XTNB6L  BP-6L 1150mah Battery Pack for S95, SE500HS, D10, SX500IS, SD4000XTSDCR  Hi-Speed SD USB 2.0 Card ReaderZECL3A  3pc. Lens Cleaning KitZEMC3A  ZE-MC3A Tri-fold Memory Card Wallet - Stores up to 3 Memory CardsZESG26  Digital Camera and Camcorder Screen Protectors for LCD's (pack of 3)ZETR5A  Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod

Reviews.Title: Inclusions w/ order
Reviews.Author: john h siedhoff
Reviews.Content: It was not clear by the descriptions, exactly what the order package included.  I knew by experience that I would need another battery, and a another larger memory chip.  I would not have had to order the additional 2-battery pack with another charger.I prefer SRL cameras.  And I definetly prefer view-finder cameras in the smaller point-and-shoot cameras.  Although the Canon SX260 HS is a good camera, one does not have the view and framing capabilities of a view-finder camera.

Reviews.Title: Shuts down in video mode
Reviews.Author: Clinton Baller
Reviews.Content: Bought it. Tried using it to shoot important kid videos. Shut down after a few seconds, saying power was out. This was with fresh batteries. Googled the issue. Found out it was a known issue, and required complicated firmware upgrade. But Canon says firmware upgrade is only required on certain serial numbers. My serial number supposedly is NOT one that requires firmware upgrade. So now what? Call customer service? Buying and using a point-and-shoot camera should not be this complicated, especially from a brand like Canon. Now return window is closed. What a pain in the a--!

Reviews.Title: decent, not perfect out of the box
Reviews.Author: Joseph Fountain "bobo"
Reviews.Content: battery life is not good, lasts a few hours, that's it.pictures come out decent once you figure out the controls, auto setting doesn't cut it for me, I found that turning off the flash improves pictures indoors quite a bit, also the slow sync is pretty good too.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures - Great Price
Reviews.Author: Kizer
Reviews.Content: I simply love this camera.  The pictures are phenomenal for the price I paid.  Love the all the features this camera provides as well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: earlysf
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for several months now but I only had the chance to use it when we went on vacation in Monterey, CA. I used it taking pictures of the birds and seals.  The zoom was really good....was able to take the pictures of those animals even though I was so far away.  My only complaint is the flash since my finger gets on its way.

Reviews.Title: Camera Returned
Reviews.Author: mary rottengen
Reviews.Content: This camera sounded terrific, but I returned it due to the poor picture quality.  Also, the knob on the top of the camera was very tight making it difficult to change modes.  I will stick with my Sony that takes great pictures even in very low light.

Reviews.Title: Not One of Canon's best
Reviews.Author: Jewels "Julie"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas ( he is a lover of Canon, (now me I prefer Nikon) but we sent it back due to battery issues, we called Canon and updated Firmware and he still had problems.  Amazon is amazing no questions asked and have refunded our money.  I will say the Rep at Canon was very helpful in trying to get this product updated, very patient.  So my husband will check out other Canon cameras (me I will still stick to my Nikon)

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little camera!
Reviews.Author: Outdoor enthusiast in NH "NH Educator"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic little camera for everyday use and especially for getting nice telephotos of people, birds, and wildlife too far away to even show up with a regular camera.  The only downside is that you have to hold really still when taking telephoto shots.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: J. Linkins "Jooles"
Reviews.Content: This was given as part of a retirement gift. It was really great to be able to give the retiree something to record their future trips etc.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX260 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image...Canon
Reviews.Author: Jiraphan
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot SX260 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image...Great camera, lens is VERY good. Solid camera for its price. However, their assist programs are quite difficult to understand for a beginner. It takes time to learn & get familiar with. I used Nikon compact before this Canon. Nikon has user friendly programs but not as good lens as Canon.Bottom line, this is a good solid camera. Love it !

Reviews.Title: Dislike
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Bakalyar
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace our Sony cyber shot that we have had for many years. We wanted it to take pictures of our newborn baby, and after hours of looking and reading reviews we got this one. BIG mistake. All the pictures have a slight blur to them so none of our newborn pics from the hospital turned out well. We tried it outside and on many different settings and still the same results. Also the flash is in a terrible spot.  I returned this camera right away and have just been using our SLR camera till we find a point and shoot that we like. Too bad....I had I hopes for this one.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So far I'm extremely disappointed in the SX280, I purchased this to replace a Cannon 260 that I lost on a trip.  The 260 took gorgeous pictures, comparable to my Cannon SLR.  All the pictures that I've taken so far with the SX280 have either had a very soft focus or were lightly blurry.  I'm going to go through the manual again to see if I can find a solution but if not this camera will need to go back.  So far it is definitely not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: There was a piece missing....
Reviews.Author: Doug Swierczynski
Reviews.Content: I already discussed with an Amazon representative and was very disappointed with her response.  I am missing a part and instead of her just sending me the simple small part she wanted me to return the whole package, every item, so I could wait for the whole thing to come again.  That was unacceptable to me because I needed to use the camera.  So I don't know if I will ever use Amazon again if this is the kind of customer service I am to expect.  I think her response was quite frankly the dumbest think to do, why could you not just send me the part which probable cost about a nickel.If someone wants to call me about this feel free, but that's my opinion and when anyone asks me about my new camera and where I bought it I tell them the whole story.

Reviews.Title: order needs a correction
Reviews.Author: Chrissy
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera, impressed with time of delivery.  However, I unpacked it and first off the Deluxe Camera Case is a Vivitar case for a belt, not anything deluxe at all.  This is not the product shown with this purchase.  The tripod is a joke!  Or maybe I should give it a chance but the case is the size of eye makeup package.  I trust I will be happier with the camera than I am at this point.  How can I receive the correct camera case?  Thank you  I will update this as soon as I use my camera.  One star is not a fair rating as I'm rating the product I received before use.  I could not get this to go through without a rate.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full-HD Video (Black) Super Bundle- Includes camera, 16 GB SDHC Memory Card, BP-6L Battery Pack, Carrying Case, SD USB Card Reader
